videos.title: Banded Twist Braid | Athletic Hairstyle | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Who else loves an easy hairstyle that can be either a great special event style OR a great athletic hairdo?  This #CGHbandedtwist is a great combination of banded ponytails and rope twists.  With all the elastics in place it makes for an easy DIY hairstyle that is sure to stay in place as your daughter is tumbling, dancing, running after a soccer ball, or scoring a free throw!  

We are always getting asked of simple hairstyles that keep the hair out of your face and still look good after a workout.  In this video we demo this style on a young girl, but I promise if you added more volume and looser bands and twists this could easily be turned into an adult style too!

videos.title: Braid Bun Combo | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Check out this darling hairstyle that is a combination of braids, twist, flips, and a bun. Sounds complicated right?  But guess what it really isn't.  Surprisingly this cute hairstyle is simply a creation using four different elements...but all four are SIMPLE hairstyle elements!  

You begin by creating two dutch braids on either side of the middle part line.  Then you take some hair sections and add them to the dutch braids to create a ponytail.  Flipping the ponytail under creates a cute pop to the whole hairstyle and if you pancake the sides it suddenly looks like a boho hairstyle!

After that you simply create two twists and roll them around to form a bun.  It's so easy!

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHBraidBunCombo

videos.title: Side Triple Flower | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Today's video is great as it is a simple and easy hairstyle for beginners.  You can do this easy hairstyle for long hair or as an easy hairstyle for medium hair.  I've used this braided bun hairstyle on myself as an easy DIY hairstyle or on my daughters!  My daughters have even done this hairstyle on each other since it's an easy hairstyle for kids to do!
What makes this hairstyle simple is that you only need to know how to do a regular braid in order to create the great side braid look.  As this hairstyle is so easy, it is also quick which means that you can use this hairstyle as a great go-to for an easy hairstyle for school. 

To begin this hairstyle you need to part off one small section of hair next to the ear.  Then divide this section into three smaller sections.  Pin two of the sections out of the way.  

With the free section of hair, begin a simple braid.  When you have the braid completed gently tug on one side of the braid to pop the edge of the braid outward.  Secure the braid with an elastic leaving the ends in the elastic to create a loop.  Use the loop and begin to roll the braid up into a bun.  

Secure the bun against the head with bobby pins.  Repeat these steps with the other two braids to create a triangle shape of rosette looking buns.  
This easy hairstyle for girls is sure to impress and would love fabulous in so many settings!  Prepare for compliments!  

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHSideTripleFlower

videos.description:
Want a quick and easy hairstyle for school? Today we will teach you how to create this simple Criss Cross Ponytail that you can do in just a few minutes!

Be sure to enter BrooklynAndBailey's GIVEAWAY for a 13" MacBook Air + Wireless Brookstone Movie Projector! Click HERE to enter! https://gleam.io/S9lr0/13-macbook-air-wireless-mobile-projector-giveaway

This hair style is perfect for girls, for teens, and for women of all ages, and would look fabulous dressed up in a fancy dress, or dressed down with a cute t-shirt and jeans. By adding curls as a base, like I did here, you could even wear this for Prom or Homecoming!

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHCrissCrossPonytail

videos.title: 3 Easy Headband Hairstyles | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
I love winter because it makes throwing on a hat or a headband so easy and simple in the mornings.  In this video I will show you three simply and easy hairstyles for wearing headbands.  Pair any of these hairstyles with a cute sweater or jacket and you are ready for the day!

The first headband hairstyle is a darling bun wrapped with a braid.  This easy hairstyle still has a sophisticated look to it that you can wear to work or other dressier events.  

The second headband hairstyle is two stacked fishtails.  I love this style for a soft, boho feel that will work with any soft, knit headband.  If you don't want to stack the braids simply do two fishtails for a similar effect.  

The third hairstyle is a cute sporty pull thru ponytail.  Add a headband and you will be ready for any winter sporting events, a day on the ski slopes, or a fun day out and about.  

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGH3HeadbandStyles

Please be sure to give this video a BIG "👍🏻" if you loved it, and leave a comment below telling us which of the 3 Winter Headband Hairstyles is your favorite!

videos.title: How to Create a Barrette Tieback | Hair Tutorials | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
For the next style from our hair tutorials, we will teach you how to create a Barrette Tieback using fishtail braids! This is the first time that we've shown you how to accent a braided hairstyle with barrettes (yes, those barrettes from your childhood)! They can make a hairstyle look AWESOME as a teenager or adult! 

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHBarretteTieback

If you don't know how to Fishtail Braid, watch our tutorial HERE!
https://youtu.be/yL7oUaIW-Dw

Tiebacks are beautiful in half-up, half down hairstyles, but how do you change them up so your hair doesn't always look the same? Today we will be working with a base of subtle curls and then using two fishtail braids that we'll secure in the back with three brass bar barrettes. We'll be securing them in a triangle.

Rylan volunteered for this tutorial, and I am not sure why, but in this video she all of the sudden seemed to have grown up a ton! Like, where did my little RyRy go??? 

Be sure to comment below if you've noticed how fast Rylan is GROWING UP, and also leave me comments for other hairstyles that you would like me to try!

videos.title: Double French Buns | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
This hair tutorial has to be a new favorite!  I LOVE the way these simple french braids combine with buns to create an easy, but flawless look.  Pair this DIY hairstyle sweater and prepare for compliments!  

Begin by parting your hair into two even sections.  Secure one section out of the way. Add dry shampoo for more volume.  Begin creating a french braid on one side of the head.  You can pause about half way down the braid to pancake and create more volume and fullness. 

At the nape of the neck take any remaining hair and secure into a ponytail.   Repeat this process on the other side until you have two secured ponytails at the nape of neck. 

 Now create buns at the bottom of they hairstyle.  You do this by only pulling the hair half way thru the last wrap of the elastic.  Then bobby pin the top half up into a crescent shape.  Roll the bottom hair up and again pin into place to create a full bun shape.  Repeat on the other side.  

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHDoubleFrenchBuns

Please be sure to give this video a BIG "👍🏻" if you loved it, and leave a comment below telling us...

videos.title: Wrapped Pull Thru Braid | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
One of my all time favorite hairstyles is the Pull Thru Braid.  So when I learned this version I knew I had to show others too!  This hairstyle tutorial is perfect for any occasion including a Homecoming dance hairstyle, a prom hairstyle, a simple every day hairstyle, or even an athletic hairstyle.

Begin this hairstyle by creating a french braid on each side of the head.  I don't add in much hair and when I run out of hair at the end I simply secure with an elastic.  

Now I take a small section of hair near the back of my head and add an elastic.  I like to poof this section to add some volume and fulness to my hairstyle.  This also gives me the base of the pull-thru braid.  

Create an entire pull thru braid with the remainer of the hair.  Be sure to pancake the hair as you go to add even more fullness!  Now I take the beginning french braids and lay them over the top of the pull thru. Use bobby pins to secure the braids to the back of your head.  

Once they are secure I roll the braid up and into a ball and tuck it under the braids to hide the ends.  Again use bobby pins to secure.  

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHWrappedPullThru

Please be sure to give this video a BIG "👍🏻" if you loved it, and leave a comment below telling us...

videos.title: HAIR HACK: DIY Reverse Braid in Under 2 Minutes! | Life Hacks | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Looking for the quickest way to get a cute braid hairstyle in under two minutes? Then this braid hair hack is for you! This has to be one of the coolest hair tutorials I have ever seen! Whoever came up with this hair style was GENIUS!

I tried this braid on myself, after seeing a video of it floating around on Facebook several months ago (one made by BraidsInAction). Kamri and I just had to film our interpretation of how to create this beautiful look! In fact, we are adding it to our list of best life hacks!

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHReverseBraidHack

You create what looks like a dutch braid beneath your chin with the hair that you have hanging down. Then after securing it, you flip it over the head... leaving you with what looks very much like a mermaid braid!

This will work with medium long, to long hairstyles, but unfortunately will not work on short hair. This is a perfect hairstyle for those mornings when you are running late, but still want a gorgeous hairstyle!

Please be sure to give this video a BIG "👍🏻" if you loved it, and leave a comment below telling us if you are already following KamriNoel's channel!

💋's -Mindy

videos.description:
Love the braided buns you are seeing around on everyone from Kylie Jenner to Mel B? 

Today we'll teach you exactly how to get the look!The Double Braided Bun Hairstyle is super easy DIY hair buns with braids! In this hair tutorial Brooklyn shows you a quick and easy hairstyle for medium hair, long hair and even some short hair if you do a half up version.  This hairstyle is super easy and perfect for school because it only take seconds to style and can be a last minute hairstyle. These quick hairstyles are also perfect for medium hair, short hair or long hair. 

What I like about this Braided Bun hairstyle is that the buns keep your hair out of your face, which really makes them a perfect hairstyle for school.  But flower buns are even cuter and pretty to look at. We did two braided buns on Brooklyn's hair! 

You can even keep some of the hair accessories for styling your DIY Braided Bun Hairstyle in your locker at school. That way you can easily make a perfect hairstyle when you arrive to school or after PE or after drill team like Brooklyn and Bailey. No need to wake up early just to fix your hair. This hairstyle is very easy and very fashionable at the same time, so get into your hairstyling spirit and let's get started!

videos.title: No-Heat Plopping Curls | Back-to-School Hairstyles
videos.description:
It has been a few months since our last no-heat curls tutorial, so we wanted to show you another one today that is perfect for Back to School!

These are called Plopping Curls {or Plunking Curls}, obviously because you plop your hair into a t-shirt, and then tie them up. I use a little product to help define the curls as they dry, so be sure to watch the video to get the full process.

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHPloppingCurls

What I love about no-heat curl tutorials is that you are using absolutely zero heat in creating them. For this tutorial, it is a t-shirt creating the curls.

Be sure to start with your hair slightly more than damp, not "dripping" wet. If the hair is too wet, your curls will not turn out. As a reference point, be sure to notice how wet my hair is when I begin the plopping.

Please be sure to give this video a BIG "👍🏻" if you loved it, and leave a comment below telling us what hairstyle we should do next!

💋's -Mindy
 

Items Needed: Damp hair, curl defining mousse, 1 t-shirt, dry shampoo, if desired.

Time Requirement: 2 minutes plopping & styling {not including overnight drying}

Skill Level: Easy

videos.title: Loop Waterfall Braid | Cute Hairstyles
videos.description:
Only 2 days left to enter BrooklynAndBailey's HUGE iPad Mini Giveaway!
http://www.cutegirlshairstyles.com/ipadgiveaway

_________

Love the Waterfall Braid? Learn how to create this Loop Waterfall Braid for a perfect hairstyle that your friends will adore! We'll teach you the EASIEST braid stitching for this braid possible, so that everyone can do it!

One of our viewers, Bethany, emailed us a photo of this style from Pinterest and by tracing back it looks like it was from a Russian website that I cannot read. It ended up being Shaun who figured out the braid technique just from looking at the picture for 15 seconds! I didn't believe him, but, yes, I have to eat my words!

The technique essentially entails creating a loop with one small strand of hair. Then reach through that loop and pull a new small section of hair half-way through a loop, and then flipping it upside down to create a new loop. Then repeating the process across the back of the head. Then you can go back and adjust the size of the loops later, to your liking.

This isn't a hairstyle that we would recommend for an active day, as the loops and bobby pins will fall out. The Loop Waterfall is simply beautiful hairstyle for those days when you just want to wear something gorgeous! 

To see your own photo recreations featured in our app, feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle on IG with: #CGHLoopWaterfall

You can use the Loop Waterfall as part of a combo, even updos, which makes it perfect for Prom or Homecoming!

I PROMISE... you will receive compliments ALL DAY when wearing this hairstyle! Not only will they love how it looks, but they'll also want to know how you did it! Enjoy!

💋's -Mindy

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray water bottle, spray hair wax, pomade, 4 small bobby pins, hairspray {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 5 minutes

Skill Level: Medium

The contest has ended, and prize awarded. Our Waterfall Twists into Mermaid Braid {http://youtu.be/Gc7p8IVVzbM} did so well back in May 2013, that we decided go for another mermaid braid look today!

This one is a half-up-half-down hairstyle with gorgeous definition in its stranding! A Mermaid Braid works just the same as a Lace Braid, however you are adding strands in on "both" sides of the braid, instead of just one. {You can think of it as an extremely fine stranded, but loose French Braid.}

I wouldn't recommend this style for anyone being very "active" throughout the day, such as PE, dance, or other athletics. This would be worn more for casual wear. Trust us, we have tried!

If you want to see your recreation photos featured in our CGH App, please feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHMermaidHalfBraid

You can carry the mermaid stranding all the way down the braid, if you would like, but we stopped half way because we loved the look! It is just a matter of personal preference.

Kamri has worn this Mermaid Half Braid a few times over the past several months, and her friends absolutely love it! She even said that a few boys commented on it, which is a huge shocker coming from boys her age!

The contest begins today and ends on Saturday, Sept 13th at 11:59pm CST. This is open internationally, and you must be age 18 or older to enter. If you are younger than that, a parent must enter. The widget picks the winner at random, on its own, we have no say at all. The widget will also ask for a valid email address, which is necessary for us email you should you win.  The email is for winner notification purposes only, and will be deleted when the contest is over. The winner then has 24 hours to claim the gift, or another winner will be drawn. YouTube as a company is neither a sponsor of, nor affiliated with, this giveaway.

This isn't a sponsored post, and the gift item was purchased by me for the sole purpose of rewarding our viewers! Thanks to you all for being with us each week, and good luck in the giveaway!

💋's to you all!

-Mindy

videos.description:
Be sure to enter BrooklynAndBailey's Back-to-School Double Backpack Giveaway here! http://youtu.be/Ku_Khqy2ApQ

* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *

It is Back-to-School season, and some days you will wear your hair down in gorgeous curls... but it will get hot in Math class!  All you have is an extra pencil. What can you do to cool down?

Create one of these Pencil Buns!

All you need is a pencil, and any one of these bun ideas will work perfectly! It will look super cute, too!

I prefer to have curls as the base on these, because the add texture helps the bun hold easier, but I created them on straight hair because I wanted you to see that they could be done.

To see your recreations featured in our CGH App, and gain your own fan base on IG, feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHPencilBuns

Enjoy!

Items Needed: One "No. 2" pencil

videos.title: Half-Loop Braidback | Back-to-School Hairstyles
videos.description:
Be sure to subscribe to BrooklynAndBailey's channel, because the girls' "Back-to-School" Series begins on Wednesday! You won't want to miss them! Click here: http://www.cutegirlshairstyles.com/BBsubscribe

* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *

Today's tutorial is inspired by a fan named Sophia {@BraidsBySophia on Instagram}, who posted a photo of this after being inspired by our French Loop Braid a few weeks ago! Now it has come full circle! {@AnniesForgetMeKnots also posted a beautiful variation of this braid!}

We love tiebacks because they are very mature looking, and can be worn with straight, wavy, or curly hair as the base. I promise, you will receive so many compliments on this one!

Using the Loop Braid technique, which incorporates skip-stitching of feathers strands from the braid, you can dress up any braid. This version uses simple braids, but you may also do this to French, Dutch, and Lace Braids.

To see your recreations featured in our CGH App, feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHHalfLoopBraidback

This style is categorized as "Medium" in skill level only because the skip-stitching can be confusing. Be sure to watch the video carefully to know when to bring back in a previously-feathered strand.

Don't you think this is beautiful? On what occasions would you wear this? Perfect for Back-to-School, right?

Have a great week!

😘 -Mindy

videos.title: How to Create Perfect Pigtails | Back-to-School Hairstyles
videos.description:
Have you seen our family's "Bean Boozled Jelly Bean Challenge"? You'll love this one! http://youtu.be/rfOq7WHxYiQ

* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *

We get asked for short hairstyles so often, that we decided to film one for this week. Rylan actually volunteered after I did the style on myself! Today we are going to show you how to Create Perfect Pigtails!

Feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHPerfectPigtails

Please remember, our channel is a resource for young girls, teens, moms & daughters, and even single dads, who vary in styling skills all the way from beginner to expert. What may be easy for one fan, may be difficult for another. We always keep that in mind when making our list of future styles.

{One problem for our lack of shorty styles on CGH is that without extra hair, many of our hairstyles may not work on short hair. We also only have one daughter, Rylan, with short hair, and she doesn't particularly enjoy her hair being done as much as the other girls. We have to respect that.} 

Contrary to what you may think, pigtails are not just for little girls. Pay careful attention to the video, where I show you a few tips to help you get a more beautiful, mature look to this everyday style!

Enjoy!
